>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.KLDWy78B7F6XoiPP]{School Specialist}

As a standard action, you can spend 1 Resolve Point to release a burst of repulsive energy in a 10-foot radius burst around you. This has two effects. First, it gives all undead in the area the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{flat-footed} condition for [[/r 1d4]]{1d4} rounds, and while flat-footed in this way, the undead also take a â€“2 penalty to saving throws against your necromancy spells. Second, all undead in the area are pushed 10 feet away from you. Affected undead can attempt a Reflex save (DC = 10 + half your level + your key ability score modifier) to negate both effects.
